title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.14 - Telephones
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.14 - Telephones

State Regulations

Each cottage or separate living unit shall have 24-hour
telephone service or an intercom system connected with an outside telephone
service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
442.14

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
